title: Apportionment; property factor
context: ยง235-30 Apportionment; property factor. The property factor is a fraction, the numerator of which is the average value of the taxpayer&rsquo;s real and tangible personal property owned or rented and used in this State during the tax period and the denominator of which is the average value of all the taxpayer&rsquo;s real and tangible personal property owned or rented and used during the tax period. [L 1967, c 33, pt of ยง1; HRS ยง235-30]
